text: Jerry Spinelli (born February 1, 1941) is an American children's novelist. He was born in Norristown, Pennsylvania. His works focused on adolescence and early adulthood. He is best known for Maniac Magee, Stargirl and Wringer. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Papers of Jerry Spinelli are held in Gettysburg College's Special Collections & Archives. The collection includes manuscripts 1961â€“2003 as well as other materials.
